english_translation: Narrated by Qatadah from Mujahid from Ka'b ibn Ujrah: The Prophet ﷺ came to him during the time of Hudaybiyyah when he was kindling a fire under a pot, and the vermin of his head were dropping onto his face. He said: "Does the vermin of your head cause you pain?" He said: "Yes." He said: "Shave your head, and upon you is an expiation from fasting, or charity, or a ritual sacrifice - slaughter an animal, or fast three days, or feed six poor people."
